content: Storage quota successfully set to default.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a success message when setting a storage quota to its default value, typically displayed after a button click or operation in the FilesActionsStore and SpaceQuota components. It informs users that the quota has been successfully reset to its original size.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'default' is transliterated as 'defolt'. The correct spelling is 'defolt' or a more accurate equivalent in Azerbaijani should be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'standart' or 'baxılan' instead of 'defolt' to better reflect the meaning of 'default' in this context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Storage quota successfully set to default' is better conveyed with a more natural-sounding phrase in Azerbaijani. The current translation feels somewhat literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like 'Yaddaş kvotası əvvəlki göstəriciyə qaytarıldı' (Storage quota has been returned to the previous indicator) or 'Yaddaş kvotasının ilk göstəriciyə qoyuldu'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "լռելյայն" (lrel'yayn) which translates to 'default' or 'silent' is a bit too formal and not the most natural way to express 'default' in this context. It implies a quiet or implicit setting rather than the intended meaning of the storage quota being reset to its original value.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "վթևորվել է" (vthevorvel e) which means 'was reset' or 'has been reset' or a simpler phrasing like "վթևորվել է սկզբնական ցուցիչին" (vthevorvel e sk'vzbnakan cucichin) which translates to 'was reset to the original value'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ກຳນົດກໍານານບ່ອນເກັບຂໍ້ມູນສຳເລັດແລ້ວຕາມຄ່າເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ' is overly formal and complex. 'ກໍານານ' is not the common word for 'quota'. A more natural translation would be closer to 'ອຸປະຖິ່ນເກັບຂໍ້ມູນຖືກຕັ້ງຄ່າໄວ້ເປັນຄ່າເລີ່ມຕົ້ນແລ້ວ' or 'ອຸປະຖິ່ນສັງເກດການເກັບຂໍ້ມູນຖືກຕັ້ງຄ່າຕາມຄ່າເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອຸປະຖິ່ນເກັບຂໍ້ມູນຖືກຕັ້ງຄ່າໄວ້ເປັນຄ່າເລີ່ມຕົ້ນແລ້ວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Limit pamięci został pomyślnie ustawiony na domyślny' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Storage quota successfully set to default.' A more natural and accurate translation would emphasize the reset aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Limit przestrzeni dyskowej został przywrócony do domyślnego.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Limită de stocare este setată cu succes la valorile prestabilite." is not the most natural or direct translation of "Storage quota successfully set to default." "Valorile prestabilite" implies a set of defaults, while the English implies a single default value. A more accurate translation would be something like "Cota de stocare a fost resetată la valoarea implicită." or "Cota de stocare a fost resetată la valoarea prestabilită."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cota de stocare a fost resetată la valoarea implicită.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ආචයන සලාකය පෙරනිමියට සැකසිණි' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Storage quota successfully set to default." The word 'ආචයන' (aachayana) doesn't fit the context and might be a mistranslation. It implies something like 'storage container' but isn't the common term for a storage quota.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation might be something along the lines of 'ගබඩා අවකාශය පෙරනිමියට යොදා ඇත' (gabada awashaya peranimiyata yoda ata ethena) which translates to 'Storage space has been reset to default.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kvóta úložiska bola úspešne upravená na predvolené nastavenie' translates to 'Storage quota was successfully modified to the default setting.' While not entirely wrong, it doesn't convey the same meaning as 'Storage quota successfully set to default.' 'Set' implies an action of establishing the quota, whereas 'modified' implies a change from a prior state.  'Reset' is a more accurate representation of the original meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kvóta úložiska bola úspešne obnovená na predvolené nastavenie.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Складишна' (Skladishna) is not the correct term for 'Storage' in this context. It translates more closely to 'warehouse' or 'storage space'. The correct term should be 'Просторна' (Prostorna) or 'Чланивна' (Clanivna) which refers to 'storage quota'.
